subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Michael Pineda, who strained a muscle during a suspension for using pine tar in an April game, had been scheduled for another rehabilitation start, but the Yankees determined he was ready to return this week.
snippet: Michael Pineda, who strained a muscle during a suspension for using pine tar in an April game, had been scheduled for another rehabilitation start, but the Yankees determined he was ready to return this week.
